note: I'm a software developer, I worked at the BBC for a while, I worked for Douglas Adams building h2g2, and I've been coding for close to 40 years. These days I'm still coding, but you might know me better from my blog https://vhistory.wordpress.com/ where I archived almost 3000 VHS tapes I recorded off the telly, and I've recently started looking at recordings from the post-VHS era, starting with recordable DVDs.
